## R Markdown

```{r}
models <- generateModels(k =3)

some_models <- NULL

for (N in 1:length(models)){
  some_models[N] <- modelToStr(models[[N]])
}

some_models <- str_replace(some_models, "Y ~", "")

some_models <- str_replace_all(some_models, ":", "")

some_models_2 <- some_models

some_models_2[10:13] <- some_models[11:14]
some_models_2[14] <- some_models[10]

some_models <- some_models_2

save(some_models, file = "connectivity/loads/some_models")

```
